title: Is it a crime?
body: Is it a crime if i have my keybindings to Numberpads and i'm trying something new and i'm winning games with the keybindings and people are calling me shit cause i do my combos wrong by accident so do i have to have QWER forever?

replies.body:
People change their key bindings a lot of the time. Some put their key bindings to PS4 controllers. Heck, someone even did it with a xylophone. 

You just need time to get used to your key bindings.
